sentences.sContent: ...Within the Alps in Central Europe is Liechtenstein...
...independent states in Europe are San Marino and Luxembourg...
...Europe is home to several extremely tiny countries...
...less than half the figure in Europe and the United States...
...000 books in all of Europe in 1450...
...Female economists agree with men that Europe has too much regulation and that Wal-mart is good for society...
...Tea drinking was introduced to Japan in the 6th century while it had not been introduced into Europe or America until the 17th and 18th centuries...

phrases.pCn: 欧洲理事会；欧洲委员会

trans.tranOther: the continent that is north of the Mediterranean and goes as far east as the Ural Mountains in Russia
